languages.text: {n}Приверженцы малых культов по незнанию сплотились вокруг клана бригадиров, видя в атакующих очередную попытку угнетения их веры. Они не знали, что потворствуют генетической порче, поразившей их мир.{/n}

{n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the foreman clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Приверженцы малых культов по незнанию сплотились вокруг клана бригадиров, видя в атакующих очередную попытку угнетения их веры. Они не знали, что потворствуют генетической порче, поразившей их мир.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The followers of minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt at oppressing them. They were unaware that they were condoning the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

{n}The followers of minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt at oppressing them. They were unaware that they were condoning the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

{n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

{n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

{n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the foreman clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

languages.text: {n}小型教派的追随者下意识地聚集在警督氏族周围，以为这些攻击者又是来压迫他们的。他们全然没有意识到，自己沦为了基因瘟疫的帮凶，而这场瘟疫已经感染了他们的世界。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}小型教派的追随者下意识地聚集在警督氏族周围，以为这些攻击者又是来压迫他们的。他们全然没有意识到，自己沦为了基因瘟疫的帮凶，而这场瘟疫已经感染了他们的世界。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los seguidores de los cultos menores, sin saberlo, se unieron en torno al clan de los brigadistas, viendo a los atacantes como un intento más de oprimirlos. Ignoraban que estaban contribuyendo a mantener la plaga genética que había infectado su mundo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los seguidores de los cultos menores, sin saberlo, se unieron en torno al clan de los brigadistas, viendo a los atacantes como un intento más de oprimirlos. Ignoraban que estaban contribuyendo a mantener la plaga genética que había infectado su mundo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}少数派魔女団の信者らは、それを、攻撃者がまた自分たちを抑圧しようと見なし、知らず知らずのうちに准将一族の周りに結集した。彼らは、自分たちが、惑星を感染させた遺伝子疫病を広める手助けをしていることに気づいていなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}少数派魔女団の信者らは、それを、攻撃者がまた自分たちを抑圧しようと見なし、知らず知らずのうちに准将一族の周りに結集した。彼らは、自分たちが、惑星を感染させた遺伝子疫病を広める手助けをしていることに気づいていなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Considérant les attaquants comme de nouveaux oppresseurs venus les mettre au pas, les disciples des cultes mineurs s'allient à contrecœur au clan des Brigadiers, ignorant qu'ainsi, ils contribuent à répandre l'épidémie génétique qui infecte leur monde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Considérant les attaquants comme de nouveaux oppresseurs venus les mettre au pas, les disciples des cultes mineurs s'allient à contrecœur au clan des Brigadiers, ignorant qu'ainsi, ils contribuent à répandre l'épidémie génétique qui infecte leur monde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Anhänger der kleineren Kulte unterstützten unwissentlich den Brigadierclan, da sie die Angreifer nur als weiteren Versuch sahen, sie zu unterdrücken. Sie ahnten nicht, dass sie mithalfen, die genetische Seuche zu stärken, die ihre Welt infiziert hatte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The followers of the minor cults unknowingly rallied around the brigadier clan, seeing the attackers as yet another attempt to oppress them. They were unaware that they were helping sustain the genetic plague that had infected their world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Anhänger der kleineren Kulte unterstützten unwissentlich den Brigadierclan, da sie die Angreifer nur als weiteren Versuch sahen, sie zu unterdrücken. Sie ahnten nicht, dass sie mithalfen, die genetische Seuche zu stärken, die ihre Welt infiziert hatte.{/n}
